comments: Standing/Crouching LP can be rapid canceled
moves_vt1.name: Crouching LP

comments: Crouching LP can be rapid canceled
moves_vt1.name: Crouching LK

comments: Gains Rokushaku Horokudama as a special move while active
moves_vt1.name: Rokushaku Horokudama (Akebono)

comments: Gains Rokushaku Horokudama as a special move while active
moves_vt1.name: Rokushaku Horokudama (Hizakari)

comments: Gains Rokushaku Horokudama as a special move while active
moves_vt1.name: Rokushaku Horokudama (Tasogare)

comments: Subject to counter hit during move duration
Can perform the follow-up motion up to active frame 3F of the second hit
On hit, can cancel into EX Airborne Kunai, Airborne Kunai Ikkinage from attack active frames 7-17F
moves_vt1.name: EX Kazekiri

comments: Recovery values are for on contact
Rokushaku Horokudama will explode upon V-cancel
The second hit can cause Rokushaku Horokudama to explode.
moves_vt1.name: EX L Kunai

comments: Recovery values are for on contact
Regular 2nd hit will not hit the bomb, during V-cancel it will make Rokushaku Horokudama explode
The second hit can cause Rokushaku Horokudama to explode.
moves_vt1.name: EX M Kunai

comments: Recovery values are for on contact
The 2nd hit will not hit the bomb
The second hit can cause Rokushaku Horokudama to explode.
moves_vt1.name: EX H Kunai

comments: The second hit can cause Rokushaku Horokudama to explode.
moves_vt1.name: EX Airborne Kunai

comments: Number of hits changes depending on the number of Kunai stored (1 - 6 hits)
Can be canceled into special moves except for Kunai and EX Kunai
Value displayed is for 6 Kunai in stock (for every Kunai less than 6, -2F from recovery, -20 from damage, -10 from Meter Gain on hit)
During V-cancel, from the 6th to the 5th the recovery is -3F, for the rest it's -2F
moves_vt1.name: Kunai Ikkinage

comments: Number of hits changes depending on the number of Kunai stored (1 - 6 hits)
Value displayed is for 6 Kunai in stock (for every Kunai less than 6, -20 from damage, -10 from Meter Gain on hit)
moves_vt1.name: Airborne Kunai Ikkinage

comments: Can perform regular moves, Airborne Kunai, and Nobusuma
moves_vt1.name: H Kasumigake

comments: Hold the buttons to increase the refill amount (1 - 6)
Smallest amount is displayed. 109F for the max refill
moves_vt1.name: Kunai Hoju

comments: Hold the buttons to increase the refill amount (3 - 6)
Smallest amount is displayed. 87F for the max refill
moves_vt1.name: EX KunaiHoju
